{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_FirePlasma}} '''A_M_FirePlasma'''
(no parameters)
Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. Otherwise, calls [[A_FaceTarget]], fires a {{Class|PlasmaBall}} and sets the calling actor's special1 field to current tic + 20. This replicates {{Class|PlasmaRifle}} [[A_FirePlasma|fire]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes.
